items.sentence: Just because I'm quiet doesn't mean I don't have anything to say.
It stopped raining and we were able to finish our game of tennis.
The distance from the sun to the earth is about 93 million miles.
I'm hoping I can spend more time doing that now that I'm retired.
You shouldn't have done that without first asking for permission.
Tom and Mary are probably not as old as everyone thinks they are.
Tom believes the government wants to hide the truth about aliens.
I don't think that there's any chance that Tom will believe that.
I think that we may have something you'd be interested in buying.
Tom said that he doesn't think that doing that is worth his time.
